tool.name: CNVkit Export CDT
tool.description: Convert log2 ratios to Clustered Data Table (CDT)

param.name: input_segmented_file
param.label: Log2 Copy Ratio Data File
param.help: The output of the CNVkit 'fix' sub-command

tool.help: This tool converts CNVkit log2 copy ratio data to the CDT format, which is compatible with Java TreeView for visualisation and hierarchical clustering. The conversion enables efficient exploration and interpretation of genomic copy number variations.
